verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> or <S%H7892>Song<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>. His <S%H3248>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> more than all the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Glorious <S%H3513>things<s%> are <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of thee, O <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> and <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to them that <S%H3045>know<s%> me: behold <S%H6429>Philistia<s%>, and <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, with <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>; this man was <S%H3205>born<s%> there.
And of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%>, This and that <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> in her: and the <S%H5945>highest<s%> himself shall <S%H3559>establish<s%> her.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5608>count<s%>, when he writeth <S%H3789>up<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that this man was <S%H3205>born<s%> there. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
As well the <S%H7891>singers<s%> as the <S%H2490>players<s%> on instruments shall be there: all my <S%H4599>springs<s%> are in thee.
